projects.description: Developed an open-source evaluation framework for large multimodal models (LMMs) supporting text, image, video, and audio tasks. I extended this suite to wildlife datasets (MammAlps, AnimalKingdom) to benchmark models like InternVL3-8B on species and behavior recognition, creating reproducible pipelines and standardized metrics.
projects.presentation: assets/Benchmarking VLMs for Animal Behavior Analysis with LMMs-Eval.pdf
projects.presentation_summary: Extended LMMs-Eval to wildlife datasets (MammAlps and AnimalKingdom). Registered Jaccard Index and evaluated InternVL3-8B on species/action/activity benchmarks; demonstrates reproducible evaluation pipelines and standardized metrics.

projects.title: EPFL AI Tutor (NLP Course Project)
projects.description: As part of a 4-person team, we built a specialized AI tutor for EPFL course content. We fine-tuned a 0.6B LLM using DPO, RAG, and Quantization. My specific role was implementing the quantized pipeline.

projects.title: Movie Violence and Crime Correlation Analysis
projects.description: Owned the real-world crime data pipeline for a team project. I explored, extracted, and cleaned daily US crime statistics (NIBRS) to engineer the weekly 'violence score,' the key dependent variable for our team's ARDL time-series model.

projects.title: Machine Learning for Plasma Transition Detection
projects.description: Developed time-series models (Bi-LSTM, Uni-LSTM) to detect H-L back-transitions in tokamak plasma. I implemented the full data preprocessing pipeline, engineered feature sets (including FFT), and systematically evaluated model performance (F1 Score: 0.72).

projects.title: Cadmium Catcher: Live Biotherapeutic Product (iGEM)
projects.description: Contributed to the project from conception to production, including wet lab work. I also led the web development, designing and coding the official website to communicate our science, which helped win the 'Best Education Prize'.
projects.notes: Awards: Gold Medal (iGEM 2023), Best Education Prize
